thread.title: John Legend trolled Donald Trump like a champion
thread.title_full: John Legend trolled Donald Trump like a champion

author: Martha Tesema
title: John Legend trolled Donald Trump like a champion
text:
John Legend trolled Donald Trump like a champion 84 By Martha Tesema 2017-02-23 18:00:07 UTC 
Donald Trump hasn't brought up his inauguration crowd size in a while, but that doesn't mean John Legend hasn't forgotten the controversy surrounding the president's claims. 
When Legend found himself flying over the National Mall in Washington D.C. on Wednesday, he brilliantly took the opportunity to snap a pic and troll Trump with a cheeky Instagram caption. A post shared by John Legend (@johnlegend) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:06pm PST 
"As you can see, millions are gathered in the National Mall, awaiting my arrival!!," Legend wrote on Instagram, paired with a shot of the same scene where Trump was inaugurated — only, completely empty. The post riffs off a tweet that went viral, comparing the 2009 and 2017 inaugurations. The crowd size comparison, from 2009 and today. pic.twitter.com/iMYZy9PRK8 
— Matt Viser (@mviser) January 20, 2017 
No word on how Trump feels about the millions waiting for Legend, but knowing him, he might have some thoughts to share with us all soon.
